|stockos = ZyNOS;v3.60(JM.2);; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, 5-pin header,, (9600 8N1),, J1 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = ZyXEL |defaultssid_regex = ^ZyXEL$ |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/20/2003 |estreldate = 08/10/2004 |estprice = |upc = 760559110628 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0002V2NWU |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Z-Com XG-601 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Intersil;ISL3880; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;; |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ZyXEL", "P/N: 45-401-000365", and "Made in Taiwan" is silkscreened on the main board. :"XG-601 V02," "70-480301-01", and "2003 12 11" is silkscreened on the XG-601 wireless module. The board layout is essentially identical to that used by the [[ZyXEL Prestige 334W (P-334W)]]. The ZX1600 chip is omitted on this model.. but the pads for it (and additional associated components) remain. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.zywall.com/upload/download_library/HS100W_v1_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.zywall.com/upload/download_library/HS100-HS100W_v3.62_userguide.pdf User's Guide]
[http://www.zywall.com/upload/download_library/HS100W-QSG.pdf QSG]
[http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/HS-100W On the Linux-mips wiki] ===Reviews=== [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/24718-reviewhs100w Review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (dated 2005-01-03)
